name: TaroDev
postCreateCommand: cd /workspaces/Taro && pip install -e . && mkdir -p /workspaces/Taro/src/taro/migrations/versions_backup && cp /workspaces/Taro/src/taro/migrations/versions/*.py /workspaces/Taro/src/taro/migrations/versions_backup/ 2>/dev/null || true && taro drop -y && rm -f /workspaces/Taro/src/taro/migrations/versions/*.py && python -m alembic revision --autogenerate -m 'initial_migration' && python -m alembic upgrade head
